column5: How many rods can you use per person in Canada.
Only one @ a time. I take many more than I need. Later, Jay
Actually it depends on the regulations of the specific zone. Zone 20, Lake Ontario, allows 2 rods per angler.

Be specific. Canada is a big country. There are ten provinces: Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland and Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan. There are three territories: Northwest Territories, Nunavut, and Yukon.
